title: The fashion investments to make in your 40s, whether you have £50 or £1,000
text:
In our new six-part series, we outline the classic pieces worth buying at different ages. Previously we looked at fashion investments to make in your 20s and in your 30s. This week, we reveal why sunglasses and suits are critical fashion investments in your 40s.

By the time a woman reaches her 40s, she knows herself. She knows what suits her and what doesn’t. She knows her size in all her favourite brands, as well as which looks will work for her and which make no sense in the context of her lifestyle.
